TITLE: Episode 149 - Youth of the Apocalypse with Justin Marler
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by a man whose claim to fame would have been as the guitarist of a well-loved stoner metal band, but after they recorded their first album and were on their way to prominence, he left. He went to go live in an Orthodox Monastery and lived as a monk for 7 years. We're going to explore this story and more this week and you should join us.
